description:
When V2 slopers feel like V12 during the heat of summer, slap on a bit of this. When used as a base for regular chalk, liquid chalk provides an extra layer of grip for friction dependent projects or super-hot days.

  • No more dust! Good for those with chalk allergies or for at-home hangboard use
  • Keeps your hands dry without having to re-chalk when working longer boulder problems
  • Compact 200ml size fits into your chalk bucket pocket
name: Mammut Liquid Chalk
